trans-unit.source: Converts a time span expressed in minutes.
trans-unit.target: 将转换以分钟为单位表示的时间跨度。

trans-unit.source: This type, like all the other configuration converter types, converts strings found in the configuration file to and from the related strongly typed properties.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型，如所有其他配置转换器类型，将在配置文件与相关的强类型属性中找到的字符串转换。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the TimeSpanMinutesConverter converts <xref:System.String> minutes, assigned to a configuration property, to <xref:System.TimeSpan> minutes and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，将转换 TimeSpanMinutesConverter<xref:System.String>分钟，为分配给配置属性，<xref:System.TimeSpan>分钟，反之亦然。</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The TimeSpanMinutesConverter persists values of type `long` representing a number of minutes.
trans-unit.target: TimeSpanMinutesConverter 仍然存在类型的值`long`表示的分钟数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you use the converter types provided by the system.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，你使用由系统提供的转换器类型。

trans-unit.source: The only time you need to use the TimeSpanMinutesConverter constructor is when you create your own conversion type.
trans-unit.target: 创建你自己的转换类型时需要使用 TimeSpanMinutesConverter 构造函数的唯一时间。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.String> to a <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref:System.String>到一种<xref:System.TimeSpan>。</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The system uses the ConvertFrom method when reading from a configuration file to convert a <xref:System.String> value to <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: 系统使用 ConvertFrom 方法从配置文件读取数据时将转换<xref:System.String>到<xref:System.TimeSpan>。</xref:System.TimeSpan>值</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object used for type conversions.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>用于类型转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object used during conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>在转换过程中使用的对象。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> object to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>要转换的对象。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The representing the data parameter in minutes.
trans-unit.target: 表示 data 以分钟为单位的参数。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.TimeSpan> to a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref:System.TimeSpan>到一种<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The system uses the ConvertTo method when writing to a configuration file to convert a <xref:System.TimeSpan> to a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 系统使用 ConvertTo 方法写入到配置文件时将转换<xref:System.TimeSpan>到一种<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object used for type conversions.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>用于类型转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object used during conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>在转换过程中使用的对象。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value to convert to.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的值。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: The representing the value parameter in minutes.
trans-unit.target: 表示 value 以分钟为单位的参数。
